creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: small mountain landscape: mountain at UL; trees on embankment at LR; small building at LL; inscription URQ
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, Mark, and Seal

URQ
markings: top L when rolled, in pen: [Hanko Tiny]; URC, two-part rectangular intaglio seal
title: Reading Books in the Waterside Pavilion
